sentences.en: He advanced funds of his own to his company, which was unable to repay him.
sentences.cn: 他把自己的资金预付给他的公司，而公司却不能把钱偿还给他。

sentences.en: He was so good to me that I can never repay the debt I owe him.
sentences.cn: 他对我太好了，我永远也还不清这份人情。

sentences.en: I advanced him some money, which he would repay on our way home.
sentences.cn: 我先借给他一些钱，在我们回家的路上他会还给我的。

sentences.en: I feel honor bound to repay the money I borrowed.
sentences.cn: 我觉得有责任归还我借的钱.

sentences.en: I must repay her for her kindness.
I owe you a debt of gratitude which I shall never be able to repay.
sentences.cn: 我永远报答不尽你的恩情.

sentences.en: I will repay this money as soon as I can.
sentences.cn: 我会尽早还给你这笔钱.

sentences.en: I wish I could repay you somehow for your kindness.
sentences.cn: 但愿对你的好意我能有所报答.

sentences.en: I’d like to buy them something to repay all their kindness.
sentences.cn: 我想给他们买点东西来报答他们的好意。

sentences.en: If you lend me 2, I'll repay it ( to you ) tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 你要是借给我两英镑, 我明天就还 ( 给你 ).

sentences.en: It was very kind. I don't know how I can ever repay you.
sentences.cn: 真是太好了。我都不知道怎么报答你才好。

sentences.en: Just lend me 10 dollars, and I'll repay you tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 借一下十块钱, 明天还给你.

sentences.en: The genetic bases of such phenomena might well repay investigation.
sentences.cn: 这种现象的遗传基础或许很值得研究.

sentences.en: The land is not fertile enough to repay cultivation.
sentences.cn: 这块土地不够肥沃,不值得耕种.

sentences.en: The proceeds from the sale will be used to repay the loan.
sentences.cn: 销售所得将用来偿还贷款.

sentences.en: They agreed to repay their creditors over a period of three years.
sentences.cn: 他们同意3年内向债主还清欠款.

sentences.en: Your mortgage will be repaid over 25 years.
sentences.cn: 你的按揭贷款将在25年内还清。

trans.tran_en: to pay back money that you have borrowed
to do something for someone, or give them something, in return for helping you
